Binding.name: DETAILS_RESET_SEGMENTS
Binding.description: Clear all segments.

Binding.name: DETAILS_SCROLL_DOWN
Binding.description: Scroll down the window which you have the mouse over.

Binding.name: DETAILS_SCROLL_UP
Binding.description: Scroll up the window which you have the mouse over.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REOPEN_WINDOW1
Binding.description: Reopen window 1.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REOPEN_WINDOW2
Binding.description: Reopen window 2.

Binding.description: Reopen window 3.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REOPEN_WINDOW4
Binding.description: Reopen window 4.

Binding.name: DETAILS_REOPEN_WINDOW5
Binding.description: Reopen window 5.

Binding.name: DETAILS_CLOSE_WINDOW1
Binding.description: Close window 1.

Binding.name: DETAILS_CLOSE_WINDOW2
Binding.description: Close window 2.

Binding.name: DETAILS_CLOSE_WINDOW3
Binding.description: Close window 3.

Binding.name: DETAILS_CLOSE_WINDOW4
Binding.description: Close window 4.

Binding.name: DETAILS_CLOSE_WINDOW5
Binding.description: Close window 5.

Binding.name: DETAILS_BOOKMARK1
Binding.description: Change the display on the first window to bookmark #1.

Binding.description: Change the display on the first window to bookmark #2.
